flawed_nl_solution:
Each dog would eat 250 grams so 4 will would eat 4 x 250 grams = <<4*250=10000>>10000 grams of food per day.
10000 grams is equal a 10 kilogram.
Emily is going on vacation for 14 days and with the 4 dogs together eating 10 kilogram of food per day, 14 days x 10 kg of food/day = <<14*10=140>>140 kg of food would be enough for two weeks.
#### 140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 10000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
